original_text: The priest is to examine them, and if there is a white swelling in the skin that has turned the hair white and if there is raw flesh in the swelling,
korean_text: 제사장은 진찰할지니 피부에 흰 점이 돋고 털이 희어지고 거기 생살이 생겼으면

sentences.original_text: The priest is to examine them
and if there is a white swelling in the skin
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 피부에 흰 부기가 있다면

sentences.original_text: that has turned the hair white
and if there is raw flesh in the swelling
